page.title: 16NOMANSLAND SHOPPING LIST
page.content:
We are finding things that you would get when you would shop.Then we will add the prices.
1.Twelve sized 3 eggs would cost 70p-90p. 2.1lb of streaky bacon would cost 80p-Â£1.00. 3.1 pint of milk would cost 22p-23p. 4.Half a pound of tea would cost 85p-90p. 5.1lb of rump steak would cost Â£2.80._Â£3.20. 6.1lb of pork would cost Â£1.20_Â£1.46p. 7.1lb of potatoes would cost 19p_13p. 8.1lb of carrots would cost 12p_13p. 9.1 packet of custard powder would cost 12p_14p. 10.Small tin of mixed fruit would cost 30p_37p. 11.Mars bar would cost 17p_18p.
